nodes.label: The Execution of Thjazi Fang
nodes.description: Public execution by hanging of Thjazi Fang at Guardian Wall under authority of Chamber of Lords-Advisory
outcomes: Secret Message spell between Azune and Thjazi
Thjazi sees something in sky and panics

nodes.label: The Farramh (Wake)
nodes.description: Traditional orcish funeral gathering at Halandil's home with body viewing and rites
nodes.location: Halandil Fang's home, The Rookery, Dol-Makjar
outcomes: Vaelus arrives seeking Stone of Nightsong

nodes.label: The Raid on Thjazi's Hideout
nodes.description: Masked attackers raid secret apartment, critically injure Thimble, steal artifacts
nodes.location: Secret apartment in Ograhmson Leather Tannery, The Tanners
outcomes: 4 attackers escape with Stone of Nightsong
Teor's Cure Wounds saves Thimble from death
Kattigan's Clue spell reveals fight details

nodes.label: Discovery at Fang Home
nodes.description: Black clay mask in silver box reforms when Thimble's name spoken
nodes.location: Hal's study, upper floor of home

nodes.label: Halandil 'Hal' Fang
nodes.description: Older distinguished orc bard, theater owner and performer in The Rookery
items: Deed to dithyramb of Azgra theater

nodes.label: Azune Nayar
nodes.description: Human sorcerer serving as Arcane Marshal in Revolutionary Guard
relationships: Served under Thjazi in Falconer's Rebellion
traits: Tattooed 'Have mercy on those I send you'

nodes.label: Thjazi Fang
nodes.description: Executed orc rebel, arcanist, thief and adventurer
final_words: Tell Thimble not to be scared
The Penteveral, you have to help her

nodes.label: Thimble
nodes.description: Four-inch tall pixie from Faerie, aging after doors closed, wings damaged

nodes.label: Teor Pridesire
nodes.description: Tall powerful lionfolk Vanguard Marshal and mercenary in golden armor
relationships: Served with Thjazi in Falconer's Rebellion

nodes.label: Thaisha Lloy
nodes.description: Orc druid of the Old Path from noble Lloy smithing family

nodes.label: Occtis Tachonis
nodes.description: Young anxious human necromancer, low in House Tachonis succession

nodes.label: Wicander Halovar
nodes.description: Light Priest of Candescent Creed, grandson of Photarch, nervous demeanor

nodes.label: Tyranny
nodes.description: Demon Aspirant to Candescent Creed with distinctive appearance

nodes.label: Julien Davinos
nodes.description: Knight of House Davinos who captured Thjazi, has deep hatred for him
relationships: Captured Thjazi at Battle of Maharlian Falls

nodes.label: Kattigan Vale
nodes.description: Weathered ranger and bounty hunter, old friend who previously left the group
relationships: Old friend of Thjazi, Teor, Azune

nodes.label: Bolaire Lathalia
nodes.description: Masked museum curator and antiquities expert with mysterious appearance

nodes.label: Murray Mag'Nesson
nodes.description: Dwarf wizard and arcanist mentioned in Thjazi's dying words

nodes.label: Vaelus
nodes.description: Extremely tall elf Sister of Sylandri seeking the Stone of Nightsong

nodes.label: Aranessa Royce
nodes.description: Noble lady of House Royce, estranged wife of Thjazi who still loved him
relationships: Estranged wife of Thjazi (married ~40 years ago)

nodes.label: Loza Blade
nodes.description: Ancient powerful orc, former Commander of Torn Banner, retiring

nodes.label: Shadia Fang
nodes.description: Daughter of Halandil and Thaisha

nodes.label: Hero Fang
nodes.description: Daughter of Halandil, mother is Elodie (merchant)

nodes.label: Talcydimir 'Cyd' Pridesire
nodes.description: Brother of Teor, should have driven escape wagon but never showed

nodes.label: Olgud Akarat
nodes.description: Business partner of Halandil

nodes.label: Elodie
nodes.description: Merchant, mother of Hero Fang

nodes.label: Photarch Yanessa Halovar
nodes.description: Grandmother of Wicander, head of House Halovar and Candescent Creed

nodes.label: Godard Halovar
nodes.description: Father of Wicander

nodes.label: Alogar
nodes.description: Son of Thaisha and Halandil, mentored by Julien Davinos

nodes.label: Enmity
nodes.description: Demon Aspirant, sister of Tyranny

nodes.label: Dol-Makjar
nodes.description: City of revolution at eastern edge of Kahad, seat of Revolutionary Council

nodes.label: Guardian Wall
nodes.description: Monument with 80-foot statues of Shapers' War heroes carved from mountainside

nodes.label: The Rookery
nodes.description: Neighborhood of poets, performers, actors with towers and sky bridges

nodes.label: The Tanners
nodes.description: Working class, grimy neighborhood with tanneries

nodes.label: Villa Aurora
nodes.description: Estate of House Halovar

nodes.label: The Penteveral
nodes.description: Institution mentioned by Thjazi, where Murray works

nodes.label: Sundered Houses
nodes.description: Coalition of noble families gaining power in Dol-Makjar

nodes.label: Candescent Creed
nodes.description: Religious order worshipping abstract divinity called 'the Light'

nodes.label: Revolutionary Guard
nodes.description: Military and law enforcement serving Revolutionary Council

nodes.label: Revolutionary Council
nodes.description: Governing body of Dol-Makjar, seat of power in city

nodes.label: Torn Banner
nodes.description: Mercenary company, mostly retired or disbanded

nodes.label: Crow Keepers
nodes.description: Thieves guild identified by crow feathers at crime scene

nodes.label: Old Path
nodes.description: Druidic and orcish tradition

nodes.label: Sisters of Sylandri
nodes.description: Religious order to which Vaelus belongs

nodes.label: House Halovar
nodes.description: Sundered House, seat of Candescent Creed

nodes.label: House Royce
nodes.description: Sundered House led by Lady Aranessa

nodes.label: House Davinos
nodes.description: Vassal house of House Royce

nodes.label: House Tachonis
nodes.description: Sundered House, Occtis's family

nodes.label: Chamber of Lords-Advisory
nodes.description: Governing body that ordered Thjazi's execution

nodes.label: Shapers' War
nodes.description: Mortal rebellion against seven gods resulting in their defeat

nodes.label: Falconer's Rebellion
nodes.description: Military conflict where many characters met and fought together

nodes.label: Closing of Faerie Doors
nodes.description: Doors to Faerie closed during or after Shapers' War

nodes.label: Battle of Maharlian Falls
nodes.description: Battle where Julien captured Thjazi

nodes.label: Stone of Nightsong
nodes.description: Magical artifact created after celestial nightingale's destruction
nodes.function: Ferries elven souls through underworld to afterlife

nodes.label: Escape Glyph
nodes.description: Magical Misty Step item meant to teleport Thjazi from execution
nodes.creator: Thimble
nodes.status: Real one at hideout, fake one on Thjazi's body
nodes.problem: Plan failed - Thjazi had wrong glyph

nodes.label: Black Clay Mask
nodes.description: Magical artifact that reforms when 'Thimble' is spoken

nodes.label: Thjazi's Scimitar
nodes.description: Well-used weapon with blood of magpie, returned to Hal

nodes.label: Mystery: Failed Escape Plan
nodes.question: Why did the escape plan fail?

nodes.label: Mystery: Thjazi's Sky Vision
nodes.question: What did Thjazi see in the sky?
nodes.effect: Caused Thjazi to panic before death

nodes.label: Mystery: Who Knew About Hideout
nodes.question: Who knew about the hideout location?

nodes.label: Mystery: Stone of Nightsong Purpose
nodes.question: Why steal the Stone of Nightsong?

nodes.label: Mystery: Julien's Shadow Curse
nodes.question: What curse follows Julien?
nodes.source: Spitting on corpse during funeral rites

nodes.label: Mystery: The Reforming Mask
nodes.question: What is the reforming black mask?

nodes.label: Mystery: Thjazi's Final Messages
elements: Tell Thimble not to be scared
The Penteveral, you have to help her

edges.description: Execution in morning leads to wake in evening
Raid happens shortly before wake begins
Mask activation occurs at end of wake
Married ~40 years ago, estranged but she still loved him
Had dealings through intermediary, mentioned in dying words
Glyph meant to save him, but he had fake one
Conducted magical scan, passed secret message
Subject of conversation, name triggers mask
Created both real and fake glyphs
Cast Cure Wounds to save Thimble
Present in nobles' box, failed to save Thjazi
Spat on Thjazi's corpse, confronted Thaisha
Used Clue spell to reveal fight details
Present at back of nobles' gallery
Detected curse on Julien with nat 20
Mask similar to Bolaire's own mask
Traveled from Mournvale to find stone
Missing person who should have driven wagon
His absence contributed to failed escape
Wake held at Hal's home in Rookery
House Halovar is one of Sundered Houses
House Royce is one of Sundered Houses
House Tachonis is one of Sundered Houses
Sundered Houses form Chamber of Lords-Advisory
Power struggle between Council and Houses
Thaisha is druid of Old Path
Aranessa is Lady of House Royce
House Davinos is vassal of House Royce
Julien is knight of House Davinos
Occtis is member, low in succession
Thimble began aging when doors closed
Mystery of why it was stolen
Plan failed, wrong glyph on Thjazi
Mystery of what the mask is
Wicander returned it to Hal at wake
Raid may be part of betrayal
Hal noticed Thjazi's reaction with nat 20
Paint with Bolaire, letter for Bolaire
Tell Thimble not to be scared
The Penteveral, you have to help her
Cyd's absence is part of failed escape mystery
